website_summaries.verdict: Choose this hall tree if its portability, small footprint, and bamboo construction appeal to you, and you don't mind its limited space and tedious assembly.
pros: Sports a handy, portable design, thanks to the caster wheels that make it easy to move
Doesn't take up a lot of room
cons: Assembly poses some frustrations, including missing parts, subpar instructions, and inadequate pre-drilled screw holes

customer_reviews.title: High quality. IKEA -like. Better than expected. Perfect for deployment.
customer_reviews.text: WELL MADE. Sturdy! Bought it for my deployment room. Need two sets of hands to assemble. Bring your own small phillips screwdriver. One is included thou. Hung my towel on crossbeam, shoes under. Air Purifier set on top shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our space!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed! Its the perfect size for our space in our guest loft which provides a little place for our guests to hang their clothes and stack their things! And I only got one splinter when I took it out of the box! hahahaha Assembly was quicker than I expected. We did use a drill for the screws which helped. The only problem with this product is that the wheels do not stay on. We had to use liquid nails to keep them from falling out when I rolled it around.
customer_reviews.author: Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for the buck. Needed this for an apt just for a year or so because it had no front closet. I haven't assembled furniture in years, but had this done in under an hour, and it looks nice and seems sturdy and also looks nice. All for $50! (The leaflet says to check for cracks, splinters, which occur naturally in bamboo, or so they say. One of the slats did have a major crack, but I didn't want to deal with getting it replace so just used it. Presumably they would have replaced it free of charge.)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The pieces came in good condition, but this product requires a ridiculous amount ...
customer_reviews.text: The pieces came in good condition, but this product requires a ridiculous amount of assembly. Having seen the picture on here, I could not believe how many part there were when I opened the box. It took my an hour and a half, and I am pretty handy with this kind of thing. The instructions were decent, at least. The finished product does look really nice. It is pretty sturdy, except for the wheels, which only kind of work sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works and reasonably priced; assembly wasn't perfect
customer_reviews.text: It looks okay, does what it's suppose to, and it's reasonably priced. Given the price you can't expect premium quality bamboo (the surface was a little rough and the coloring is not uniform). The assembly wasn't difficult, and simple tools are provided. But there are unfinished screw holes (glad it's bamboo so I cut it open myself) and many of the guiding holes are NOT aligned with where the screw would enter. I had to use a lot of force during assembly. I've only had it up for a day so I can't comment on how sturdy it is yet.
customer_reviews.author: Meng Yu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Best portable clothing rack. Holds a ton of clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I feel very happy to have this bamboo rack!
customer_reviews.text: I suuuuper love this thing. Unlike IKEA furniture this was suuuuper fun to build, it looks nice and does exactly what it's supposed to! Great purchase! I think I'd buy one again if ever I needed another. Though be aware that bamboo is a suuuuper lightweight wood and the wheels are plastic so this garment rack is not really cut out to withstand intense weight. That said, it can do the trick for many shirts and some lightweight shoes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mojdeh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as portable and temporary storage of laundry. While searching metal options, happened upon this bamboo beauty. After reading comments about assembly, I was prepared for a workout. Thanks to some assembly instructions within comments and video by company, I was able to put together by myself in an evening. (The instructions that came in box were too small for this old lady to read.) The parts were separated by bands and necessary tools were included. It is a lovely and sturdy piece that has added class to the drudgery of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Piffy

customer_reviews.title: Great clothing rack!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this because I thought it might not be very sturdy, especially if I have to assemble it myself. I am very impressed! The wood is good quality and it is very sturdy. I can dry a full large load of laundry on it. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack for my laundry room. I just put this together and it took about 30-40 minutes. The hardest part about assembly was piecing the shelving pieces together. So far it seems sturdy, but I shall see! It’s a cute little rack, I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rack, MISSING SCREWS
customer_reviews.text: Good rack for the price and went together pretty easily. Super annoying that not all screws are included, hence the two stars. I would recommend to check for the screws before assembling so you can easily return it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Conceptually easy, practically tricky to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is conceptually quite easy to assemble. In practice it is a little difficult to do as one person. I did it by myself and it took me about 45 minutes. The trickiest part was the slatted shelves. The slats were not all exactly the same size, so some were difficult to get in place without the rest falling out. That took several tries. Once it’s set up if looks cute and feels sturdy. Warning: do not over-tighten the screws!! I did that with one and I heard a slight crack in the bamboo, which is a little delicate.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble but easy to roll around
customer_reviews.text: My family assembled this but did not find it easy. But I do like the results and it is easy to roll around. We put these in our summer place that has no closets. It is fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ib

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Minimalist!
customer_reviews.text: I stuck all of my shoes at the bottom part and hang my scarf at the sides.. all my jackets and coats perfectly organized on this thing.. Oh boy! This is a great stuff. Strong like a tree and you can drag it anywhere you like with those wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chic, Sturdy Clothing Rack
customer_reviews.text: Incredible rack! It looks so much more expensive! It's not a walk in the park to put together, but I did it myself so it's not terribly difficult either. Just set aside an hour or two, read instructions carefully, and make sure you have all the parts. I think my package might have been missing a screw or something from the parts sent to me, but it still stands fine. I've had this rack for 4 months now and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose and is nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think this is a great clothes rack, not quite as big as I thought it would be. There were a few minor imperfections with the pieces and hardware, but nothing that will bother me in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nemes

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected and could not assemble. I tried to assemble for more than 2 hours and it still didn't work. The shelves did not align. And since I had already thrown the box away, I could not return.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: I like putting things together, so this was easy, but did take a little while...perhaps about an hour I would guess. It holds clothes and even items below. A great multi-function/storage rack. Small, but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Haggarty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This rack looks great and is sturdy. I love that it's made out of bamboo rather than thin metal or plastic. It's currently holding 10 winter coats without any sagging or issues. It took about 30 minutes to put together and it was a very simple straight-forward process for one person.
customer_reviews.author: ChiReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good size, decent quality wood panels, relatively easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my use - I needed something small that would act as a mini-closet to fit in my apartment. It took a bit of maneuvering to build it, but with one other person it took an hour (maybe 2, tops) to build. The small hooks on the side are a nice touch for hanging purses or scarves off! I have no fear that this will "fall over" from too much weight - I didn't attach the wheels on the bottom, so it is pretty sturdy. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Flounder whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.  Great looks and fairly sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Took a good 30-40 minutes to build, with some elbow grease. Could be sturdier with a few more screws, but it seems to hold together well. This company seems to be a good IKEA alternative, but with a nice, natural wood look instead of all the black and white plywood. Two of the little knobs cracked when I screwed them in, but it's still functional.
customer_reviews.author: stpaul2010

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the rack but it was a pain to put together. It seems like they could have at least put the slats in the shelves so the shelves are ready to go when you receive it. I'm not even sure they would have to use a bigger shipping box. Anyway. . . it works perfect for my needs for extra sweatshirts, coats and hats.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack but assembly takes patience
customer_reviews.text: I like the rack, it will be great for my guest room. However the assembly was more challenging than expected - particularly inserting the slats into the frame. It would probably be easier for two people. Also the top hanger bar split when I screwed it in. Not enough to motivate me contact the seller, but the screws won't tighten due to the split. I like the pegs on the sides, allows for hanging accessories. The text in the assembly instruction guide is terribly small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light Frame, Good Addition to Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Very light frame that went together easily and rolls easily. It's holding a good deal of clothes and I really like the shelves for bins to create additional storage opportunities. It is very light however, so excessive weight would not be good.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: We live in an old house with narrow closet doors and plastered walls. I needed something sturdy to put in my son’s closet and this fits perfectly. I plan to purchase another one because the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Deformed Part
customer_reviews.text: This clothing rack is really cute but when I was putting it together I noticed that one of the screws was deformed and could not be tightened with a screw driver. I had to tighten it with pliers so it would stay together and the pliers scratched the wood. No extra screws were included. It was very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to assemble and stronger than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to put together but two people can get it done even faster. The only concern is it is a bit shaky when rolling around but it is still holding strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy JST

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I got mine yesterday and just by puttingnit together I could tell how cute this was! I am really surprised how much clothing it can carry and how pretty it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! I've been using this for about 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! I've been using this for about 4 months now and I can't remember how I lived before. Okay, exaggerating, but really. This is a quality piece of furniture. the assembly was a little tricky but I was able to put it together by myself. I use it without the wheels to dry clothes, and to plan my outfits for the week.
customer_reviews.author: vpier

customer_reviews.title: It works well for that and looks good too. I wouldn't hang a ton of heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this laundry rack to put clothes on as I'm taking them out of the dryer. It works well for that and looks good too. I wouldn't hang a ton of heavy things on it, but for what I use it for, it's great. Take your time when putting this together. The instructions are pictures only, and it would be pretty easy to mess it up.
customer_reviews.author: K Knox

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other brands
customer_reviews.text: Similar one at UO and target for crappy quality. Had friends with those and this ones way better. Super strong wood and holds a ton of stuff, feels way nicer in person than the others I’ve found for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Took 30 minutes to put together. Easy to put together and looks great, just as pictured. Planning on getting a second one. Love that it rolls on wheels and the wheels have a locking system so it stays put. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: K. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, I didn't really need it. I just thought it would look great in my bedroom to hang clothes for the week, but I ended up using it as a guest coat rack on several occasions. I like the added features for shoes, purses and hats. I got tons of compliments on this rack because it looks nicer than your average metal rack.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa J.

customer_reviews.title: style and durability
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my nursery. My little one does not have a closet and this holds all her clothes. I put baskets on the bottom shelves and they hold all her blankets and towel. I hung her baby carrier on one of the side hooks. I get compliments all the time on how cool it looks. Great alternative when you have little or no closet space.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Functional & a smart use of space
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty piece of furniture and it is a great use of space. I do not have a closet in my room and this stores my clothing, shoes, bags, and accessories while still looking nice. It would also be a great coat rack in a mud room. Assembly was easy and did not take long. The only downside is the material splintered in a few places. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra storage
customer_reviews.text: This is great for towel storage, hanging clothes, or placing robes on extensions on the side l. And it's a made very nicely. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Marym

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the value! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the price, easy to understand manual, all tools provided only thing missing was labels on certain parts which made it harder to figure out which part it was but you can find out using the pictures in the manual. Very light in weight, actual size is accurate, and the package arrived on time with all pieces intact!
customer_reviews.author: Tamy

customer_reviews.title: two of the nails are bad, I have to use my own nails instead
customer_reviews.text: The wood is a little smelly. Besides, two of the nails are bad, I have to use my own nails instead. The nails quality it provides are really not so good. I actually want to return it, but it's hard to disassemble. It is just ok to keep it, but I really disappointed about this product.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad. So far, works well. Took a bit of time to put together but not too much. Wasn't hard to figure out. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: ... kind of person so it was a lot of fun assembling this piece together
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hands-on kind of person so it was a lot of fun assembling this piece together. It's very basic but much sturdier than the cheap-o plastic ones I've bought in the past. And the bamboo is a much nicer look than plastic
customer_reviews.author: Kamaile

customer_reviews.title: just like the other purchase I bought
customer_reviews.text: I figured I would buy this after purchasing it from another seller; however, just like the other purchase I bought, the parts did not align correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Strudy, yet not huge!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughters room. It is PERFECT for them. Sturdy for my needs. Two shelves are nice for storage. It is not huge which is also nice for their room at Grandma's!
customer_reviews.author: Jane I

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great! Way better quality than expected for the price. It's a little tricky to put together, but once it's up, it's sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bolling

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage Rack for Overnight Guests
customer_reviews.text: Got this to put in our guest bedroom. It is perfect for visitors to use as a luggage rack and to hang their clothes on. Easy to assemble and well made.
customer_reviews.author: WLL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This worked great in my daughter's room. Easy to put together and holds a decent amount of garments. I have to say this was exactly as described and worth the money 💘
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Need a power drill to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was extremely frustrating! The pre-drilled holes are not large enough for the screws. Had to pull out my power drill!! If it wasn't so frustrating to assemble, I would take it apart and return. I'd rather call it a day and realize you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Old goat

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This actually is a great value for the cost. Sturdy enough and far better looking than normal mass produced furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Lista A Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, easy to assemble and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous item! It came with easy to read instructions and all the necessary tools for assembly. It looks crisp and is extremely lightweight and easy to move. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Oran Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The clothes rack is sturdy, nice looking, and for the price it is more than worth it. I was impressed, and feel happy I ordered something that is not going to fall apart under the pressure of many clothing items!
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Love SONGMICS products
customer_reviews.text: Love SONGMICS products! It's easy to assemble and pretty light but can hold a lots of clothes. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my room. Sturdy and attractive piece. A little challenging to put together - but nothing too bad. I'm thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: JCrocker

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this rack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rack. Holds so much and takes up very little space and I was able to put it together with no trouble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lea

customer_reviews.title: Cute and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the perfect size and was easy to put together. I love it. It is a little wobbly but it isn’t that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Annelise

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to our guest room that has limited space...husband put it together in an hour...easy to follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Edan

customer_reviews.title: nice idea, a little light on quality
customer_reviews.text: a little light on the quality, had to add glue to a lot of the holes as the screws easily stripped...I think the drilled starter holes were too big.
customer_reviews.author: W. Maes

customer_reviews.title: This product is super sturdy and has held lots of my clothes in ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is super sturdy and has held lots of my clothes in a messy dorm room for about 2 years at this point! Small issue, but the wheels come off kinda easily when you move it. However, it doesn't really impede the rack's ability to do what it's meant to!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and it's completely unusable. The holes for the screws are too small for the joints between the A and B legs to be screwed in with the Allen wrench. Nice pile of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this, wonderful for bedroom with no closet and attractive
customer_reviews.text: love this, wonderful for bedroom with no closet and attractive
customer_reviews.author: wysewomyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I wanted to be able outdoor hang ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I wanted to be able outdoor hang dry some of my laundry on my back patio without looking tacky. This is now a great accent piece as well. I get so many compliments on how I have incorporated into my patio. It serves both form and function.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Noorda

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the price at all, it came damaged and with the wrong piece for one side. It’s horrible that I paid so much and now I’m just so frustrated that I don’t want to go through the troubles of returning. Do not buy this cheap item that will probably come broken! 49 bucks for a broken cheap clothes rack
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Pain to assemble, but worth it...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a pill to assemble, but ultimately it is sturdy and well constructed. I'd rather put a lot of work into something sturdy, than little work into something not... so in the end I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Stark

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive without the casters. A bit daunting to put together at first, but once you get the hang of it, it’ll go smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Baker

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together, except for the individual pieces that went into assembling the shelves. That took awhile to get the hang of. I love it overall. It’s a good size and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mara James

customer_reviews.title: I like this product but don't have the space for it
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but don't have the space for it. Will probably reorder at a later date. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Hobble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. As expected. Easy to put together and fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love this clothes rack
customer_reviews.text: I really love this clothes rack. Building it was pretty straightforward and easy. All materials/tools supplied. Pieces are all light and easy to maneuver while still being sturdy (I'm 100 pounds and most of it is not muscle). Not all the pieces fit together perfectly but I didn't really expect them to for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need another, restock asap
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is pretty sturdy and aesthetically pleasing. Holds a lot too. However several of the smaller strips came damaged. I'd love if this company ensure that these important pieces aren't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Reid

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing on the p Stop holding up my plants
customer_reviews.author: Fr. A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hanging air-dry items on
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I use this rack in my laundry room. Perfect for hanging air-dry items on. Timely shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Aynn

customer_reviews.title: Great efficient product, kind of hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces you had to play with to make them fit together. Other than that A GREAT product for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shopped around awhile before landing on this - and glad that I waited.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my office and love it - both how it looks and how useful it is. I shopped around a bunch and it's a real value while still looking not cheap. Only drawback was while assembling, one of the pieces splintered but it seems more cosmetic and doesn't effect the rack at all. Overall, would totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jess in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally do reviews, but this was such a great purchase. It is so sturdy, easy to put together and it looks so cute! Definitely recommend(:
customer_reviews.author: Sydni Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble, though there are a good number of pieces. Can’t beat it for the price! I’m using it as a plant stand with both potted and hanging plants, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: You have to be kidding, right? I couldn't believe all of the parts that had to be assembled...and the directions were limited. It took almost 3 hours to get this together. Definitely not worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for at a very student-friendly price. The rollers are extra helpful when cleaning your room.
customer_reviews.author: Dan T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extra clothes
customer_reviews.text: It was nearly impossible to put together but looks great
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It works nice and looks good in my room. It has easy set up too.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: It's so cute. We use it as a mobile ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute. We use it as a mobile baby closet that way we can see the length of each piece. It works out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought and took a while to put together. There were also some rough pieces that gave me splinters. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece to store laundry on, not to big and cumbersome!
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shelves
customer_reviews.text: The shelves are difficult to assemble I ended up throwing them out and just using the hanger function.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missih many parts. And parts I got don’t match up. Ordered two. Didn’t open second one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love using this to help us pack for trips or pair outfit options!
customer_reviews.author: MRSB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the work.
customer_reviews.text: I love the finished rack, but a pain to put together. Every single piece of wood comes lose and you have to put it together using instructions you need a magnifier to see.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Allen

customer_reviews.title: Something that I wanted to own for a little while:)
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh love it. It was very easy to install it as well, took me about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Malika Hallyyeva

customer_reviews.title: Good with the exception of a BROKEN bamboo hook
customer_reviews.text: Good with the exception of a BROKEN bamboo hook. I use it as my macrame hanging station. Fits well with the decor of my house and it's portable so easily transportable from one room to the next. Wish they can send me a replacement hook. Ahhhhmmmmm...
customer_reviews.author: GNO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my little resale booth for selling kids clothing and shoes
customer_reviews.author: angikv

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY smart looking rack! It came in a million tiny pieces (hard to believe it fit in the box) but, with some perseverance, really became an impressive rack that is nice enough to have in full view!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together, I assembled it on my own in less than an hour; you will need a screwdriver. Rack is sturdy and holds 25 articles of clothing with ease. (a mix between shirts and jackets) Bottom shelves are great for storing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: It showed up in a beat up package and didn't include any of the hardware to put it together. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alibiestu

customer_reviews.title: Came missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Received box already open and had been rifled through. Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Just what my daughter needed. Easy to put together too
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: This item was very easy to install. Measurements are exact and quality was not too bad. It was what I was looking for since I didn't count with a big space to place it in. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy. love it. havent had one problem with it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Stylish. Came in a ton of pieces, took a long time to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Charla W.

customer_reviews.title: fairly easy ot assemble and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Over flow coat rack for entry room. Stable, fairly easy to assemble and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: the holes did not match up and was very frustrating - had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Sahba Maani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, functional and it looks cute in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old clothes fits perfect on the rack and baskets. I needed something that did not take that much space and this rack, got the mess under control.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Marcelino

customer_reviews.title: Mismatched part and hole
customer_reviews.text: There is mismatched hole on part B, which doesn't fit at all with the other part, there is no way to reassemble it.I have to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Clothes Rack on Wheels, Rolling Garment Rack with 2-Tier Storage Shelves, Hall Tree with 4 Coat Hooks for Shoes, Clothing, Bamboo URCR52N
feature_bullets: SAY HELLO TO BAMBOO: Say goodbye to cold, rigid garment racks and flimsy wooden shelves! Warm up your room with this eye-pleasing natural bamboo rack. It will surprise you with its stability and durability

ALL-IN-ONE PIECE: Whether it's your coats, shoes, bags, or scarves, they can all find their place on this multi-purpose rack. You no longer need to run between a coat rack, shoe shelf, and closets when coming back from work

2 WAYS TO USE: Use it with casters? Sure! They will help you roll the clothes rack from room to room without issue. Don’t forget about the 2 brakes that help you keep it in place. Want to use it without casters? No problem - you can do that too!

A PIECE OF CAKE TO ASSEMBLE: No need to spend an entire Sunday afternoon figuring out how to assemble it! With a simple structure and detailed instructions, you'll have it assembled before you know it
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: SONGMICS provides you with professional customer service both before and after your purchase; don’t wait any longer, add this to your home today
